report.title: Sample attribute value
report.description: Report used to retrieve custom attribute values of a sample for a specific attribute.
report.query: select a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN 'Text' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Lookup List' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Integer' WHEN 'B' THEN 'Boolean' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Float' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Specific Date' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Vague Date' ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, CASE '#language#' WHEN '' THEN a.caption ELSE COALESCE(TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM (a.caption_i18n->'#language#')::varchar), a.caption) END AS caption, STRING_AGG(CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN get_formatted_attr_text_value(a.caption, av.text_value, '#output_formatting#') WHEN 'L' THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END || CASE WHEN a.data_type IN ('I', 'F') AND a.allow_ranges=true THEN COALESCE(' - ' || av.upper_value::text, '') ELSE '' END, '; ') AS value, STRING_AGG(CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'I' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'B' THEN av.int_value::varchar WHEN 'F' THEN av.float_value::varchar WHEN 'D' THEN av.date_start_value::varchar WHEN 'V' THEN (av.date_start_value::varchar || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::varchar ELSE NULL::text END, '; ') AS raw_value, STRING_AGG(CASE WHEN a.data_type IN ('I', 'F') AND a.allow_ranges=true THEN av.upper_value::text ELSE null::text END, '; ') AS upper_value from sample_attributes a left join (sample_attribute_values av join samples s on s.id=av.sample_id and s.deleted=false join surveys srv on srv.id=s.survey_id and srv.deleted=false and srv.website_id in (#website_ids#) ) on av.sample_attribute_id=a.id and av.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on a.data_type='L' and lookup.id=av.int_value where av.sample_id=#sample_id# and a.deleted=false and a.id=#sample_attribute_id# group by a.system_function, a.id, a.data_type, a.caption

param.name: sample_id
param.description: ID of the sample to load

param.name: language
param.description: ISO 3 letter code of language to use for captions if available.
